review: I am casting approximately 5 feet from my computer to my TV and not only is there a delay in the play but it actually freezes constantly and will eventually go blank. review: My sister is more of the techie. I bought this for her, she was very excited, because she wanted one but didn't want to pay for it. I got it for a  really good price, about $27. She has only had it for a week or so, but good so far.
